properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.config.data-key
properties.description:
If format is Format.PROPERTIES or Format.YAML
 then the following field is used as key to look up consul for configuration.

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.config.fail-fast
properties.description: Throw exceptions during config lookup if true, otherwise, log warnings.

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.config.name
properties.description: Alternative to spring.application.name to use in looking up values in consul KV.

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.config.watch.delay
properties.description: The value of the fixed delay for the watch in millis. Defaults to 1000.

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.config.watch.enabled
properties.description: If the watch is enabled. Defaults to true.

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.config.watch.wait-time
properties.description:
The number of seconds to wait (or block) for watch query, defaults to 55.
 Needs to be less than default ConsulClient (defaults to 60). To increase ConsulClient
 timeout create a ConsulClient bean with a custom ConsulRawClient with a custom
 HttpClient.
